projects.title: Juris
projects.description: An enterprise-grade RAG platform for legal document processing. Includes multi-container FastAPI microservices, OpenAI LLM integration, and production-level deployment on Akash and Azure. Developed entire backend architecture with vector indexing and CI/CD automation.

projects.title: Aegis Intercept
projects.description: An open-source missile defense gym using reinforcement learning. Developed 2D and 6DOF adversarial environments, integrating PPO, curriculum learning, and hierarchical policies. Emphasizes reproducibility and defense research alignment.

projects.title: SimuVerse
projects.description: An AI simulation framework designed to explore multi-agent collaboration using large language models (LLMs). Built in Unity with Python-Langchain backend, featuring tool-chaining, interpreter-based agent communication, and 3D visualization. Led technical architecture and implementation, optimizing agent memory and Unity synchronization.
